name: All Gone (Incredible Seal Team)
description:
Concept:

Small narrative game that takes the form of a platformer.

Summary :

After losing his home and family, Tom decided to return to the manor a month after the tragedy.

So he goes to visit him, thinking about his family and the things he cared about.

He will find objects that will bring him a strong emotion that will make him live flashbacks.

Through these flashbacks he will realize his double personality and his crime.
